00052 int tonatiuh_script::init( QScriptEngine* engine )
00053 {
00054         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00055         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00056         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00057 
00058         rayTracer->Clear();
00059 
00060         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_exportAll = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_exportAll );
00061         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_exportAll", fun_tonatiuh_exportAll );
00062 
00063         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_export = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_export );
00064         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_export", fun_tonatiuh_export );
00065 
00066         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_filename = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_filename );
00067         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_filename", fun_tonatiuh_filename );
00068 
00069         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_irradiance = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_irradiance );
00070         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_irradiance", fun_tonatiuh_irradiance );
00071 
00072         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_numrays = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numrays );
00073         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_numrays", fun_tonatiuh_numrays );
00074 
00075         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_numdivisions = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numdivisions );
00076         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_numdivisions", fun_tonatiuh_numdivisions );
00077 
00078         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_photon_map = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_photon_map );
00079         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_photon_map", fun_tonatiuh_photon_map );
00080 
00081         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_random_generator = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_random_generator );
00082         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_random_generator", fun_tonatiuh_random_generator );
00083 
00084         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_sunposition = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_sunposition );
00085         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_sunposition", fun_tonatiuh_sunposition );
00086 
00087         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene );
00088         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene", fun_tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene );
00089 
00090         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers );
00091         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers", fun_tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers );
00092 
00093         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_saveas = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_saveas );
00094         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_saveas", fun_tonatiuh_saveas );
00095 
00096         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_trace = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_trace );
00097         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_trace", fun_tonatiuh_trace );
00098 
00099         return 1;
00100 }

00102 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_exportAll(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00103 {
00104         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: takes exactly one argument." );
00105         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: argument is not a string." );
00106 
00107         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00108         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00109 
00110         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00111         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_exportAll: the export fileName is empty." );
00112 
00113         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00114         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00115         {
00116                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00117                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00118                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00119                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00120         }
00121 
00122         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00123         if( !( modelFile.absoluteDir().exists() ) )
00124         {
00125                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_exportAll: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00126                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00127         }
00128 
00129         int result = rayTracer->SetExportAll( fileName );
00130         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_exportAll: Error." );
00131 
00132         return 1;
00133 }
00134 
00135 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_export(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00136 {
00137         if( context->argumentCount() < 2 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: takes at least two argument." );
00138         if( context->argumentCount() > 3 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: takes at most three argument." );
00139 
00140         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: argument 1 is not a string." );
00141         if( !context->argument( 1 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: argument 2 is not a string." );
00142         if( (context->argumentCount() == 3) && !context->argument( 2 ).isBool() )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export() argument 3 is not a boolean." );
00143 
00144         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00145         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00146 
00147         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00148         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: the export fileName is empty." );
00149 
00150         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00151         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00152         {
00153                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00154                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00155                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00156                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00157         }
00158 
00159         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00160         if( !( modelFile.absoluteDir().exists() ) )
00161         {
00162                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_export: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00163                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00164         }
00165 
00166         QString surfaceName = context->argument(1).toString();
00167         QStringList nodeNames =  surfaceName.split( "/",QString::SkipEmptyParts );
00168 
00169         if( nodeNames[0] != "SunNode" )
00170         {
00171                         surfaceName = QString( "//SunNode/" );
00172                         surfaceName.append( nodeNames.join( QString( "/" ) ) );
00173         };
00174 
00175         bool isValidSurface = rayTracer->IsValidSurface( surfaceName );
00176         if( !isValidSurface )
00177         {
00178                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_export: %1 is not a valid surface to export." ).arg( surfaceName );
00179                 context->throwError( message );
00180         }
00181 
00182         bool coordinates = true;
00183         if( context->argumentCount() == 3)      coordinates= context->argument(2).toBool();
00184 
00185         int result = rayTracer->SetExportSurface( fileName, surfaceName, coordinates );
00186         if( result == 0 ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: Error." );
00187         return 1;
00188 }

00190 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_filename(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00191 {
00192         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00193         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00194 
00195         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: takes exactly one argument." );
00196         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: argument is not a string.");
00197 
00198 
00199 
00200         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00201         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return  context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: the model file is not correct." );
00202 
00203         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00204         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00205         {
00206                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00207                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00208                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00209                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00210 
00211         }
00212 
00213         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00214         if( !modelFile.exists() )
00215         {
00216                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_filename: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00217                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00218         }
00219 
00220         int result = rayTracer->SetTonatiuhModelFile( fileName );
00221         if( result == 0 )
00222         {
00223                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_filename: The %1 file is not a valid file." ).arg( fileName );
00224                 return context->throwError( message );
00225         }
00226 
00227         return 1;
00228 }

00231 {
00232         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00233         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00234 
00235 
00236         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_irradiance: takes exactly one argument." );
00237         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_irradiance: argument is not a number." );
00238 
00239         double irradiance = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00240 
00241         int result = rayTracer->SetIrradiance( irradiance );
00242         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, "tonatiuh_irradiance: UnknownError." );
00243 
00244         return 1;
00245 }

00247 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numrays(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00248 {
00249         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00250         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00251 
00252         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: takes exactly one argument." );
00253         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: argument is not a number." );
00254 
00255         double nrays = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00256         if( nrays < 1 ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: the number of rays must be at least 1." );
00257 
00258         int result = rayTracer->SetNumberOfRays( nrays );
00259         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: UnknownError." );
00260 
00261         return 1;
00262 }

00264 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numdivisions(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00265 {
00266         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00267         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00268 
00269         if( context->argumentCount() < 1 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: takes at least one argument." );
00270         if( context->argumentCount() > 2 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: takes no more than two arguments." );
00271         if(context->argumentCount()==2){
00272                 if( !context->argument( 1 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: second argument is not a number." );
00273 
00274                         double nheightdivisions = context->argument(1).toNumber();
00275                         if( nheightdivisions < 1 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: the number of heigth divisions must be at least 1." );
00276 
00277                         int result = rayTracer->SetNumberOfHeightDivisions( nheightdivisions );
00278                         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: UnknownError." );
00279         }
00280         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: argument is not a number." );
00281 
00282         double nwidthdivisions = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00283         if( nwidthdivisions < 1 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: the number of width divisions must be at least 1." );
00284 
00285         int result = rayTracer->SetNumberOfWidthDivisions( nwidthdivisions );
00286         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: UnknownError." );
00287 
00288         return 1;
00289 }

00291 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_photon_map(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00292 {
00293         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00294         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00295 
00296         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: takes exactly one argument." );
00297         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: argument is not a string." );
00298 
00299         QString photonMapType = context->argument(0).toString();
00300         if( !rayTracer->IsValidPhotonMapType( photonMapType ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: defined photonMap type is not valid." );
00301 
00302         int result =    rayTracer->SetPhotonMapType( photonMapType );
00303         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: UnknownError." );
00304 
00305         return 1;
00306 }

00308 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_random_generator(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00309 {
00310 
00311         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: takes exactly one argument." );
00312         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: argument is not a string." );
00313 
00314         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property( "rayTracer" );
00315         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00316         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00317 
00318         QString randomDeviateType = context->argument(0).toString();
00319         if( !rayTracer->IsValidRandomGeneratorType( randomDeviateType ) )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: defined random generator type is not valid." );
00320         rayTracer->SetRandomDeviateType( randomDeviateType );
00321 
00322         int result =    rayTracer->SetRandomDeviateType( randomDeviateType );
00323         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: UnknownError." );
00324 
00325         return 1;
00326 }

00328 QScriptValue  tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_sunposition(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00329 {
00330         //tonatiuh_sunposition( azimuth, elevation, distance );
00331         if( ( context->argumentCount() < 2 ) || ( context->argumentCount() > 3 ) )
00332                 return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: takes 2 argument." );
00333         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: argument 1 is not a number." );
00334         if( !context->argument( 1 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: argument 2 is not a number." );
00335 
00336         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00337         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00338         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00339 
00340         double azimuth = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00341         if( ( azimuth < 0. ) || ( azimuth > 360. ) )    return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: azimuth value must be between 0 and 360 degrees." );
00342         rayTracer->SetSunAzimtuh( azimuth );
00343 
00344         double elevation = context->argument(1).toNumber();
00345         if( ( elevation < 0. ) || ( elevation > 90. ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: elevation value must be between 0 and 90 degrees." );
00346         rayTracer->SetSunElevation( elevation );
00347 
00348         return 1;
00349 
00350 }

00358         if( context->argumentCount() )  context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene() no takes arguments." );
00359 
00360         int result = rayTracer->SetSunPositionToScene();
00361         if( result == 0 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene() error." );
00362 
00363         return 1;
00364 }

00367 {
00368         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00369         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00370         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00371 
00372         if( context->argumentCount()!=1 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers() takes exactly one argument." );

00375         if( result == 0 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers() error." );

00380 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_saveas(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00381 {
00382         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00383         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00384         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00385 
00386         if( context->argumentCount()!=1 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas() takes exactly one argument." );
00387         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas: argument is not a string.");
00388 
00389         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00390         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas: the model file is not correct." );
00391 
00392         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00393         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00394         {
00395                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00396                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00397                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00398                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00399         }
00400 
00401 
00402         int result = rayTracer->Save(fileName);
00403         if( result == 0 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas() error." );
00404 
00405         return 1;
00406 }

00408 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_trace(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00409 {
00410         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00411         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00412         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00413 
00414         if( context->argumentCount() )  return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_trace() no takes arguments." );
00415 
00416         int result = rayTracer->Trace();
00417         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_trace() error." );
00418 
00419         return 1;
00420 }
